name: The 6h International Joint Conference on Pervasive and Embedded Computing and Communication Systems
content: The purpose of PECCS is to bring together researchers and practitioners interested in both theoretical advances and applications of Pervasive and embedded computing and communication. PECCS is composed of two co-located conferences, each specialized in at least one of the aforementioned main knowledge areas: The International Conference on Pervasive and Embedded Computing – PEC 2016 Url: http://www.pec.peccs.org/ The International Conference on Signal processing and Computing Systems– SPCS 2016 Url: http://www.spcs.peccs.org/ PECCS 2016 will be held in conjunction with PhyCS 2016\. PECCS KEYNOTE LECTURE Siegfried Benkner, University of Vienna, Austria Maria R. Ebling, IBM T.J. Watson Research Center, United States PECCS CONFERENCE CHAIR César Benavente-Peces, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid, Spain
